name: Just A Generic Platformer
description:
This is the second game ive ever finish because any other project ive started has never been finished and this on was the only one i finished

I also used a free asset pack to help with 2D Platformers on the asset store so heres the link to that https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/templates/systems/2d-flexible-platformer-c...

P.S You should prolly play it in full screen

Controls

Jump - W or Space

Move - A and D
